attributes.action: Provide a support and training program designed to end homelessness.
attributes.additional_details:
Participants will sign a contract and if they comply they will be entitled to:
1) Rehabilitation - They must attend rehab classes to help with their addiction to harmful substances.
2) Accommodation and food - They will share a room and facilities with three other people. They will get three meals a day.
3) Training-They will attend job training to help them find employment.

They pay back a percentage of their salary if they find work. Research shows that by intervening we actually save money.
attributes.background: Homelessness is a worldwide issue. It is certainly a problem in the UK and it is growing at an alarming rate. We are class of year 6 pupils who want our government to take action; they can make a difference and we have come up with a plan we think will help.
